title: The Brief – The Bengal tiger tears out Brussels’ green heart
summary_full: When Ursula von der Leyen hailed the “mother of all deals”, she was unwittingly on the money: India gives birth to a new era of trade agreements unencumbered by insurmountable climate differences
summary_public: When Ursula von der Leyen hailed the “mother of all deals”, she was unwittingly on the money: India gives birth to a new era of trade agreements unencumbered by insurmountable climate differences
